title: Robot and Raygun - Issue 1 + 2 Science Fiction Magazine
description:
AvAnSyS

_Robot and Raygun - Issue 1 March 2014_
_Robot and Raygun - Issue 2 April 2014_

_Description:_
Science fiction short story magazine.

Robot and Raygun features all kinds of science fiction, from post apocalyptic worlds to starships travelling through the voids of space and all that lies between. It is our aim to help our fire your imagination and to envision the many futures that lay before us.
Each issue is made up of a selection of short stories to help you discover great new writers of science fiction.

Issue 1:
The Host - Ellen Denton
Umbilicus - Alex Burns
Burst My Bubble - Sierra July
The Enemy Within - Ellen Denton
Binary Dreamer - Paul D. Hayes 

_As always if you like the book then buy it._
